value.text: Fanon about Avatar: The Last Airbender
value.value_text: Fanon about Avatar: The Last Airbender

paragraphs.body: Avatar fanon was a collective wiki about fanon stories of ${link_0}. As a wiki, anyone could edit, and all things were accepted. In 2009, the wiki was administrated by users Waterkai, SuperFlash101, Zukofan123, and Vaznock.
paragraphs.text: Avatar fanon was a collective wiki about fanon stories of Avatar: The Last Airbender. As a wiki, anyone could edit, and all things were accepted. In 2009, the wiki was administrated by users Waterkai, SuperFlash101, Zukofan123, and Vaznock.

paragraphs.body: Avatar fanon is now part of Avatar Wiki. Its portal can be found at ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: Avatar fanon is now part of Avatar Wiki. Its portal can be found at Project:Avatar fanon.

paragraphs.body: Avatar Fanon Wiki was created on 20 November 2007 by Paperclipchains. The project found it difficult to start, and September 2008 was the first month where the number of active users exceeded six. The only administrative appointment in those months was Masterhybrid. However, the project sustained a level of growth from then, and four administrators were appointed, including Vagrant Lustoid.
paragraphs.text: Avatar Fanon Wiki was created on 20 November 2007 by Paperclipchains. The project found it difficult to start, and September 2008 was the first month where the number of active users exceeded six. The only administrative appointment in those months was Masterhybrid. However, the project sustained a level of growth from then, and four administrators were appointed, including Vagrant Lustoid.

paragraphs.body: After the blocking of a vengeful user, Avatar fanon Wiki suffered from a rare but large vandal attack. Because of this vandalism, two users were granted rollback rights, The 888th Avatar and Vaznock. A month later, the first admin who wasn't a bureaucrat was chosen, Vaznock.
paragraphs.text: After the blocking of a vengeful user, Avatar fanon Wiki suffered from a rare but large vandal attack. Because of this vandalism, two users were granted rollback rights, The 888th Avatar and Vaznock. A month later, the first admin who wasn't a bureaucrat was chosen, Vaznock.

paragraphs.body: On June 27, 2009, Avatar fanon and Avatar Wiki merged into one wiki in order to increase the amount of traffic of future users, creating the Fanon Portal on this wiki. ${link_0} were created as a result of this merge. The group was later disbanded as a result of community consensus in February 2012.
paragraphs.text: On June 27, 2009, Avatar fanon and Avatar Wiki merged into one wiki in order to increase the amount of traffic of future users, creating the Fanon Portal on this wiki. Fanon administrators were created as a result of this merge. The group was later disbanded as a result of community consensus in February 2012.
